name: All Tools (Licensed)
description: Access every tool we offer — cookie checkers, automation tools, and more. Licensed .exe with personal key.
long_description:
All Tools — Licensed Access

Get licensed access to the full collection of tools including cookie checkers, automation scripts, and utility tools.

What's Included:
  - Every tool in our library — checkers, automation, utilities
  - All future tool releases included during your plan
  - Personal license key tied to your system
  - Delivered as .exe files
  - Private channel access with direct support
  - Replacement if a tool stops working during your plan

Pricing:
  - Monthly: $50/month
  - Yearly: $150/year (save $450)

How It Works:
  - Tools are .exe only — no source code
  - Each license is tied to one machine
  - New tools are added as they're built — no fixed schedule
  - Renewal required to keep access after plan ends
requirements: Windows PC required — tools are .exe only, no source code. Not suitable for mobile or macOS. License is tied to one machine and is non-transferable. Access ends when your plan expires.

name: All Tools (Source Code)
description: Full source code (.py) for every tool we offer — checkers, automation, and utilities. Modify and run on your own.
long_description:
All Tools — Source Code Access

Get the full Python source code for every tool in our library.

What's Included:
  - Complete .py source files for all tools
  - Cookie checkers, automation tools, and utilities
  - All future tool source code during your plan
  - Run, modify, and customize however you want
  - Private channel access with direct support

Pricing:
  - Yearly: $350/year

How It Works:
  - Source code delivered as .py files
  - You run them on your own Python environment
  - Full freedom to modify and adapt the code
  - New tools are added as they're built
  - No license key needed — you own the source for your plan period
  - Renewal required to keep receiving new tools after plan ends
requirements: Python 3.x environment required. You are responsible for setting up and running the scripts. Source code is for personal use — no resale or redistribution. Access to new tools ends when your plan expires.

name: Cookie Checkers (Licensed)
description: Access all cookie checkers only — licensed .exe with personal key. No other tools included.
long_description:
Cookie Checkers — Licensed Access

Get licensed access to all cookie checker tools only.

What's Included:
  - All current and future cookie checkers
  - Personal license key tied to your system
  - Delivered as .exe files
  - Private channel access for checker updates
  - Replacement if a checker stops working during your plan

Pricing:
  - Monthly: $40/month
  - Yearly: $120/year (save $360)

What's NOT Included:
  - Other tools like automation scripts or utilities
  - This plan is strictly for cookie checkers only

How It Works:
  - Checkers are .exe only — no source code
  - Each license is tied to one machine
  - New checkers added as they're built
  - Renewal required after plan ends
requirements: Windows PC required — checkers are .exe only, no source code. Not suitable for mobile or macOS. License is tied to one machine and is non-transferable. This plan covers cookie checkers only — no other tools.

name: Cookie Checkers (Source Code)
description: Full Python source code (.py) for all cookie checkers. Run, modify, and customize on your own.
long_description:
Cookie Checkers — Source Code Access

Get the full Python source code for all cookie checker tools.

What's Included:
  - Complete .py source files for every cookie checker
  - All future checker source code during your plan
  - Run, modify, and customize however you want
  - Private channel access for updates

Pricing:
  - Yearly: $280/year

What's NOT Included:
  - Other tool source code like automation or utilities
  - This plan covers cookie checkers only

How It Works:
  - Source code delivered as .py files
  - You run them in your own Python environment
  - Full freedom to modify the code
  - New checkers are added as they're built
  - Renewal required to keep receiving new checkers
requirements: Python 3.x environment required. You are responsible for setup and running. Source code is for personal use — no resale or redistribution. Covers cookie checkers only, no other tools.

name: Cookie Membership
description: Private cookie drops from multiple sites — not posted anywhere else. Limited to 5 members.
long_description:
Cookie Membership

Get exclusive cookie drops that are never posted publicly or in any other channel.

What's Included:
  - Private cookies from multiple premium sites
  - Drops every 3-4 days minimum
  - Completely exclusive — not shared anywhere else
  - Direct access to the private drop channel

How It Works:
  - Cookies are based on what's extracted — no custom requests
  - Quality over quantity approach
  - Limited to 5 members only to keep drops exclusive
  - Replacement if a cookie expires too quickly

This is for people who want consistent, exclusive access without competing with public channels.
requirements: Drops are based on availability — specific site requests are not guaranteed. No sharing cookies outside the group. Limited to 5 members to maintain exclusivity.

name: GPT Membership
description: ChatGPT access through browser cookies with regular replacements. Multiple plan durations available.
long_description:
GPT Cookie Membership

Use ChatGPT through browser cookies with replacement support.

What's Included:
  - Working ChatGPT cookie delivered to you
  - 1 cookie replacement every 2 days
  - Replacement provided if cookie expires early
  - Works on any browser (Firefox recommended)

Plan Options:
  - 10 days: $1
  - 15 days: $1.50
  - 1 month: $4

How It Works:
  - Import the cookie into your browser using a cookie editor
  - Use ChatGPT as normal through the browser
  - If it expires, request a replacement within your plan limits
  - Firefox is recommended for best compatibility
requirements: Browser-based access only — Firefox recommended for best results. No sharing or misuse. Replacements are provided within plan limits only. Cookie import instructions included.

name: Netflix TV Membership
description: Monthly Netflix access for smart TVs — HD or UHD plans available. Replacement included.
long_description:
Netflix TV Membership

Monthly Netflix access designed for smart TV use.

Plans Available:
  - HD Plan: $2/month
  - UHD (4K) Plan: $3.50/month

What's Included:
  - Netflix access for your TV
  - HD or UHD quality depending on your plan
  - Replacement if access stops working
  - Monthly renewal available

Important:
  - This is for TV access only
  - Setup is your own responsibility — no setup guide or support provided
  - Replacement only, no refunds
requirements: TV setup is your own responsibility — no setup help or guide provided. Access is for TV use only. Replacement provided if access stops working. No refunds.

name: Hotstar Membership
description: 1 month Hotstar access with replacement support. India or Indian VPN required.
long_description:
Hotstar Membership

1 month of Hotstar access with replacement if it stops working.

What's Included:
  - Full Hotstar access for 1 month
  - Live sports, movies, TV shows, and originals
  - Replacement if access expires early

Requirements:
  - You must be in India or use an India-based VPN
  - No sharing or misuse
  - Replacement only, no refunds
requirements: Must be located in India or use an India-based VPN. No sharing or misuse. Replacement provided if access stops working. No refunds.
